title: Engaging Preference Optimization Alignment in Large Language Model for Continual Radiology Report Generation: A Hybrid Approach
details: A Izhar, N Idris, N Japar - Cognitive Computation, 2025
abstract: Large language models (LLMs) remain relatively underutilized in medical imaging, particularly in radiology, which is essential for disease diagnosis and management. Nonetheless, radiology report generation (RRG) is a time-consuming task that can …
